name: talkit
description: Web Based, Non-Linear Game Dialogue Editor. # Talkit is a fork of [et1337's](https://github.com/et1337) wonderful [The Poor Man's Dialogue Tree](http://et1337.com/2014/05/16/the-poor-mans-dialogue-tree/) which is currently part of [Lemma](https://github.com/et1337/Lemma) project. ##Description. Talkit is a Non-linear, node based, game dialog editor.  It runs on [jointJS](http://www.jointjs.com/). It exports to JSON with game ready content. ![alt text](http://i.imgur.com/7lu8NIy.png?1)
author: Richard Key <rich@busyrich.com>
